update e_doctor set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_complete = #{doctorComplete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_phone = #{doctorPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_company = #{doctorCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_address = #{doctorAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_sex = #{doctorSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_status = #{doctorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_photo = #{doctorPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_birthday = #{doctorBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_like = #{doctorLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_job = #{doctorJob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_remark = #{doctorRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_spare1 = #{doctorSpare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_spare2 = #{doctorSpare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_spare3 = #{doctorSpare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_spare4 = #{doctorSpare4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_spare5 = #{doctorSpare5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from e_doctor
(1=1)
and user_id like concat(concat(#{userId}))
and doctor_complete like concat(concat(#{doctorComplete}))
and doctor_name like concat(concat('%',#{doctorName}),'%')
and doctor_spare1 like concat(concat(#{doctorSpare1}))
and doctor_spare1 > 1
and doctor_spare4 like concat(concat('%',#{doctorSpare4}),'%')
order by doctor_spare4 desc , doctor_name asc ,doctor_id desc
